data.title: Fantasm Soldier Valis II (1989) by Renovation Game NEC PC8801 game
data.meta_description: Fantasm Soldier Valis II  is a single player beat 'em up, platformer video game for NEC PC8801, created by Renovation Game and published in 1989 by Telenet Japan.
